sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Menu, MenuItem, Sidebar, useProSidebar } from "react-pro-sidebar"; import { Img, Text } from "components"; const Sidebar1 = (props) => { const { collapsed } = useProSidebar(); const [isSmallViewport, setIsSmallViewport] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => { setIsSmallViewport(window.innerWidth < 768); // 768 is the breakpoint for sm viewport }; window.addEventListener("resize", handleResize); handleResize(); // Check viewport size initially return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", handleResize); }, []); return ( <>
{/* Code for the sidebar content */} {isSmallViewport ? ( // Sidebar content for small viewport (collapsed)
) : ( // Sidebar content for medium to xl viewport (expanded) <> } > UMaT - TSAP {/* Code for the rest of the sidebar content */}
{/* Rest of the content */}
{/* Add other icons */}
{/* Show this div only in md to xl viewport */}
Home Submissions Report Event Assignments Announcements {/* Add other text items */}
)}
); }; export default Sidebar1;
